title: Multi-Literacy-Based Literary Learning Object Utilization Strategies

context.prior_knowledge: Elementary digital literacy and comprehension of secondary-level literature
context.additional_context: Asynchronous learning via mobile devices combined with small-group collaborative activities.

learning_goals: Analyze and express the multi-interpretive meanings of literary works (text, video, audio, etc.) using three or more multiliteracy tools
Explain the social and cultural contexts of literary works with over 80% accuracy using digital learning objects
Improve literary creations three or more times based on peer feedback in a mobile-based microlearning environment
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
